metadata.title: USN-3755-1 -- GD vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that GD incorrectly handled certain images. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2018-1000222)  It was discovered that GD incorrectly handled certain GIF files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2018-5711)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3755-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgd3 - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10 libgd-dev - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10 libgd2-xpm-dev - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10 libgd-tools - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10 libgd2-noxpm-dev - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.10 No subscription required
